accountId.description: The AWS account ID for the S3 Storage Lens configuration. Defaults to automatically determined account ID of the AWS provider.

arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon Web Services organization.

configId.description: The ID of the S3 Storage Lens configuration.

storageLensConfiguration.description: The S3 Storage Lens configuration. See Storage Lens Configuration below for more details.

tags.description: Key-value map of resource tags. If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

tagsAll.description: A map of tags assigned to the resource, including those inherited from the provider `default_tags` configuration block.
